channel.title: Ray Boughen
channel.description: Recent news about Ray Boughen, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by 650 CKOM News Talk Radio
item.description:
Palliser MP Ray Boughen won't seek reelection in 2015
True to his word, MP Ray Boughen has announced he will not be seeking reelection for a third term in the House of Commons. "It was official when I first threw my hat in the ring for the riding," Boughen joked during an interview after the announcement on ...

item.title: Mentioned by Post
item.description:
Palliser MP Ray Boughen to step aside during 2015 election - Regina Leader
Come the 2015 federal election, Palliser MP Ray Boughen is planning to "put up (his) feet and unwind," confirming on Monday that he will not run for re-election. Boughen said he has "quite enjoyed" his time as an MP, but feels it's time to step aside.

item.title: Mentioned by Globalnews.ca
item.description:
MP Ray Boughen will not seek re-election
MOOSE JAW – A Saskatchewan Conservative M-P says he will not seek a third term in office when Canadians go to the polls again in 2015. Ray Boughen, who captured the Palliser riding in 2008, says a policy of two terms and out makes good sense.

item.title: Mentioned by Post
item.description:
Boughen to step aside - Regina Leader
Come the 2015 federal election, Palliser MP Ray Boughen is planning to "put up (his) feet and unwind," confirming on Monday that he will not run for re-election. Boughen said he has "quite enjoyed" his time as an MP, but feels it's time to step aside.

item.title: Mentioned by Post
item.description:
Saskatchewan MP confirms he will not seek re-election - Regina Leader
REGINA — Palliser MP Ray Boughen has confirmed he will not run in the next federal election. In a statement, Boughen said since his election in 2008 he had always intended to run for only two terms. “I believe that elected representatives should serve for a ...
